languages.text: "Я... Я должен был извиниться перед вами. Покаяться". {n}На широком несчастном лице возникает горькая гримаса.{/n} "Много лет я старался служить династии всеми силами, но в решающий час оказался бесполезен... Стыд жжет мое слабое, трусливое сердце, Ваша Светлость. Я должен был сказать вам, как сильно раскаиваюсь".

"I... I had to apologise to you. I had to repent." {n}He grimaces bitterly.{/n} "For many years, I did my best to serve the dynasty, but at the most crucial hour, I failed... Shame scorches my pathetic, cowardly heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I had to tell you how deeply remorseful I am."
languages.original_text: "Я... Я должен был извиниться перед вами. Покаяться". {n}На широком несчастном лице возникает горькая гримаса.{/n} "Много лет я старался служить династии всеми силами, но в решающий час оказался бесполезен... Стыд жжет мое слабое, трусливое сердце, Ваша Светлость. Я должен был сказать вам, как сильно раскаиваюсь".

traits.locale_text: "I... I had to apologise to you. I had to repent." {n}A bitter grimace appears on the wide and unhappy face.{/n} "For many years, I did my best to serve the dynasty, but at the most crucial hour, I was useless... Shame scorches my pathetic, cowardly heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I had to tell you how deeply remorseful I am."

Shame scorches my pathetic, cowardly heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I had to tell you how deeply remorseful I am."

Shame scorches my pathetic, cowardly heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I had to tell you how deeply remorseful I am."

Shame scorches my pathetic, cowardly heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I had to tell you how deeply remorseful I am."

"I... I had to apologise to you. I had to repent." {n}He grimaces bitterly.{/n} "For many years, I did my best to serve the dynasty, but at the most crucial hour, I failed... Shame scorches my pathetic, cowardly heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I had to tell you how deeply remorseful I am."

"I... I had to apologise to you. I had to repent." {n}He grimaces bitterly.{/n} "For many years, I did my best to serve the dynasty, but at the most crucial hour, I failed... Shame scorches my pathetic, cowardly heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I had to tell you how deeply remorseful I am."

languages.text: "Ich ... ich musste Euch um Vergebung bitten. Ich musste Buße tun." {n}Er verzieht verbittert das Gesicht.{/n} "Über viele Jahre habe ich der Dynastie gut gedient, aber dann in der kritischsten Stunde versagt ... Die Schande verbrennt mein erbärmliches, feiges Herz, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich musst Euch sagen, wie sehr ich bereue."
languages.original_text: "I... I had to apologise to you. I had to repent." {n}He grimaces bitterly.{/n} "For many years, I did my best to serve the dynasty, but at the most crucial hour, I failed... Shame scorches my pathetic, cowardly heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I had to tell you how deeply remorseful I am."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... ich musste Euch um Vergebung bitten. Ich musste Buße tun." {n}Er verzieht verbittert das Gesicht.{/n} "Über viele Jahre habe ich der Dynastie gut gedient, aber dann in der kritischsten Stunde versagt ... Die Schande verbrennt mein erbärmliches, feiges Herz, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich musst Euch sagen, wie sehr ich bereue."

languages.text: «Yo... tenía que pedirle perdón. Tenía que arrepentirme». {n}Hace una mueca de pesar.{/n} «Durante muchos años me he esforzado con denuedo para servir a la dinastía, pero a la hora de la verdad, he fracasado... La vergüenza atormenta mi patético y cobarde corazón, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tenía que decirle cuánto lamento lo ocurrido».
languages.original_text: "I... I had to apologise to you. I had to repent." {n}He grimaces bitterly.{/n} "For many years, I did my best to serve the dynasty, but at the most crucial hour, I failed... Shame scorches my pathetic, cowardly heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I had to tell you how deeply remorseful I am."

traits.locale_text: «Yo... tenía que pedirle perdón. Tenía que arrepentirme». {n}Hace una mueca de pesar.{/n} «Durante muchos años me he esforzado con denuedo para servir a la dinastía, pero a la hora de la verdad, he fracasado... La vergüenza atormenta mi patético y cobarde corazón, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tenía que decirle cuánto lamento lo ocurrido».

languages.text: 「あなたに…謝りたかった。悔い改めなければならないと…」{n}男は苦笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「長年、王朝のために全力を尽くしてきましたが、肝心な時に失敗しました…恥ずかしくて哀れで臆病なこの心が焼きつくようです、陛下。深く反省していることをお伝えしたかった」
languages.original_text: "I... I had to apologise to you. I had to repent." {n}He grimaces bitterly.{/n} "For many years, I did my best to serve the dynasty, but at the most crucial hour, I failed... Shame scorches my pathetic, cowardly heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I had to tell you how deeply remorseful I am."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたに…謝りたかった。悔い改めなければならないと…」{n}男は苦笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「長年、王朝のために全力を尽くしてきましたが、肝心な時に失敗しました…恥ずかしくて哀れで臆病なこの心が焼きつくようです、陛下。深く反省していることをお伝えしたかった」

languages.text: “我……我必须向您致歉，我必须忏悔。”{n}他脸上露出了痛苦的表情。{/n}“这么多年来，我一直尽心尽力侍奉王朝，但在这最关键的时刻，我却失败了……耻辱的火焰烧灼着我这颗可怜、懦弱的心，大人。我必须告诉您我有多么懊悔。”
languages.original_text: "I... I had to apologise to you. I had to repent." {n}He grimaces bitterly.{/n} "For many years, I did my best to serve the dynasty, but at the most crucial hour, I failed... Shame scorches my pathetic, cowardly heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I had to tell you how deeply remorseful I am."

traits.locale_text: “我……我必须向您致歉，我必须忏悔。”{n}他脸上露出了痛苦的表情。{/n}“这么多年来，我一直尽心尽力侍奉王朝，但在这最关键的时刻，我却失败了……耻辱的火焰烧灼着我这颗可怜、懦弱的心，大人。我必须告诉您我有多么懊悔。”

languages.text: « Je... je me devais de vous présenter mes excuses. De faire mon mea culpa, {n}dit-il avec une grimace amère.{/n} Des années durant, j'ai servi la dynastie au mieux de mes capacités, tout ça pour échouer au pire moment... La honte ronge mon cœur pathétique et lâche, Votre Seigneurie, et je tenais à ce que vous sachiez à quel point je m'en veux. »
languages.original_text: "I... I had to apologise to you. I had to repent." {n}He grimaces bitterly.{/n} "For many years, I did my best to serve the dynasty, but at the most crucial hour, I failed... Shame scorches my pathetic, cowardly heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I had to tell you how deeply remorseful I am."

traits.locale_text: « Je... je me devais de vous présenter mes excuses. De faire mon mea culpa, {n}dit-il avec une grimace amère.{/n} Des années durant, j'ai servi la dynastie au mieux de mes capacités, tout ça pour échouer au pire moment... La honte ronge mon cœur pathétique et lâche, Votre Seigneurie, et je tenais à ce que vous sachiez à quel point je m'en veux. »

languages.text: "Ben... Sizden özür dilemek, pişmanlığımı dile getirmek zorundaydım." {n}Acı acı yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Uzun yıllar boyunca hanedanlığa hizmet etmek için elimden geleni yaptım ancak en kritik anda başarısız oldum. Zavallı korkak kalbim utançla yanmakta {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Büyük vicdan azabı çektiğimi size söylemek zorundaydım."
languages.original_text: "I... I had to apologise to you. I had to repent." {n}He grimaces bitterly.{/n} "For many years, I did my best to serve the dynasty, but at the most crucial hour, I failed... Shame scorches my pathetic, cowardly heart, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I had to tell you how deeply remorseful I am."
